short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: They're not a lone wolf, they're a white terrorist

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tired of racist journalists labeling every brown person with a gun as a "terrorist" but every white person with a gun as a "lone wolf"? Let's fix that glitch.
